Name: Phantom: The False Sovereign
Desc: A humanoid shell formed of black sludge. It takes its place among the prey, patiently awaiting the hunters it was made to devour.
DescOpen:
This enemy has a <color=HighlightB>higher RES</color> to <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.

A humanoid mimic molded of sludge, a false sovereign, the Dark Tide's will made manifest.

Born from the utopia of Unity envisioned by the Threnodian, it is a shapeless mass of black sludge given form, a vessel created solely to devour. All things are to unite within the False Sovereign's body and be reborn as servants and children of Leviathan.

It does not think. It does not feel. Only the rippling sludge murmurs its false hymns, eternally glorifying the power of Leviathan.
